change.item: Text scanned at U. Chicago in 1988. Basic SGML tagging by Lowell Bowditch
Replaced LYRIC Meter= tag with SPEECH Meter=

$Log: aristoph.peace_gk.xml,v $ Revision 1.4 2013-06-13 12:41:19 gcrane tagging now should be compatible with CTS
Revision 1.3 2011-09-07 13:51:35 rsingh04 adding rend=displayNum to lb tags
Revision 1.2 2011-01-13 03:38:23 gcrane more refinements making these files SDL compatible
Revision 1.1 2010-12-25 20:14:24 gcrane base file -- main difference is that this uses LB milestones rather than L tags
Revision 1.3 2010/06/24 15:41:01 gcrane edits to improve named entities
Revision 1.2 2010/06/21 16:42:23 gcrane small fixes to Greek errors -- mainly accent issues with the speaker names
Revision 1.1 2009/10/08 19:12:07 rsingh04 began reorganizing texts module by collection. created separate work directory in texts module to keep hopper files separate from in progress files
Revision 1.2 2005/08/01 15:50:24 packel removed stray item tags
Revision 1.1 2005/07/25 14:28:41 packel Converted to XML
Revision 1.10 2004/09/29 14:57:00 amahoney correct speaker tags, which have the main character's name mis-accented throughout
Revision 1.9 2004/04/21 20:51:04 mimno added card 1s
Revision 1.8 2003/07/01 22:14:36 yorkc Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)
Revision 1.7 2000/03/06 20:10:31 amahoney remove spurious headers, which mess up short toc
Revision 1.6 2000/03/04 20:33:54 dasmith Added separate funder entity to TEI header.
Revision 1.5 2000/02/01 22:11:29 amahoney bring up to P3

kai\ prw=ton me\n ma/xomai pa/ntwn au)tw=| tw=| karxaro/donti,

a)ntei=xon a)ei\ kai\ tw=n a)/llwn nh/swn. w(=n ou(/neka nuni\

o(di\ de\ tridra/xmous tou\s ka/dous e)s tou\s a)grou/s.
a)ll' w)= *trugai=e tw=n drepa/nwn te la/mbane
kai\ tw=nd' o(/ ti bou/lei proi=ka: kai\ tauti\ de/xou:
ta\ dw=ra tauti/ soi fe/romen e)s tou\s ga/mous.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: i)/qi nun kataqe/menoi par' e)moi\ tau=t' ei)/site
e)pi\ dei=pnon w(s ta/xista: kai\ ga\r ou(tosi\

sp.speaker: *lofopoio/s
sp.l: oi)/m' w(s proqe/lumno/n m' w)= *trugai)= a)pw/lesas.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: ti/ d' e)/stin w)= kako/daimon; ou)/ti pou lofa=|s;

sp.speaker: *lofopoio/s
sp.l: a)pw/lesa/s mou th\n te/xnhn kai\ to\n bi/on,

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: ti/ dh=ta toutoini\ kataqw= soi toi=n lo/foin;

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: o(/mws d' o(/ti to\ sfh/kwm' e)/xei po/non polu/n,
doi/hn a)\n au)toi=n i)sxa/dwn trei=s xoi/nikas.

sp.speaker: *lofopoio/s
sp.l: krei=tton ga\r w)= ta=n e)stin h)\ mhde\n labei=n.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: a)po/fer' a)po/fer' e)s ko/rakas a)po\ th=s oi)ki/as.
ou)k a)\n priai/mhn ou)d' a)\n i)sxa/dos mia=s.

sp.speaker: *qwrako/pwlhs
sp.l: ti/ dai\ deka/mnw| tw=|de qw/rhkos ku/tei

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: ou(=tos me\n ou) mh/ soi poih/sei zhmi/an.
a)ll' ai)=re/ moi tou=to/n ge th=s i)swni/as:

sp.speaker: *qwrakopw/lhs
sp.l: pau=sai/ m' u(bri/zwn toi=s e)moi=si xrh/masin.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: w(di\ paraqe/nti trei=s li/qous. ou) deciw=s;

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: th|di\ diei\s th\n xei=ra dia\ th=s qalamia=s

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: i(/na mh/ g' a(lw= tru/phma kle/ptwn th=s new/s.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: e)/gwge nh\ *di/' w)=pi/tript'. oi)/ei ga\r a)\n
to\n prwkto\n a)podo/sqai me xiliw=n draxmw=n;

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: qli/bei to\n o)/rron. a)po/fer', ou)k w)nh/somai.

sp.speaker: *salpiggopoio/s
sp.l: ti/ d' a)=ra th=| sa/lpiggi th=|de xrh/somai,
h(\n e)pria/mhn draxmw=n poq' e(ch/kont' e)gw/;

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: mo/lubdon e)s touti\ to\ koi=lon e)gxe/as

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: to\n me\n mo/lubdon, w(/sper ei)=pon, e)/gxeon,
ta\ su=k' e)n a)grw=| toi=s oi)ke/taisin i(sta/nai.

sp.speaker: *kranopoio/s
sp.l: w)= duska/qarte dai=mon w(/s m' a)pw/lesas,
o(/t' a)nte/dwka/ g' a)nti\ tw=nde mna=n pote/:
kai\ nu=n ti/ dra/sw; ti/s ga\r au)/t' w)nh/setai;

sp.speaker: *doruco/s
sp.l: oi)/m' w)= kranopoi/' w(s a)qli/ws pepra/gamen.

sp.speaker: *doruco/s
sp.l: e)/t' e)sti\ toi=si kra/nesin o(/ ti tis xrh/setai;

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: a)/meinon h)\ nu=n au)/t' a)podw/setai polu/.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: tou/tw| g' e)gw\ ta\ do/rata tau=t' w)nh/somai.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: la/boim' a)\n au)/t' e)s xa/rakas e(kato\n th=s draxmh=s.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: nh\ to\n *di/', w(s ta\ paidi/' h)/dh 'ce/rxetai
ou)rhso/mena ta\ tw=n e)piklh/twn deu=r', i(/na
a)ll' o(/ ti per a)/|dein e)pinoei=s w)= paidi/on,
au)tou= par' e)me\ sta\n pro/teron a)nabalou= 'nqadi/.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: o(plote/rous a)=|don, kai\ tau=t w)= triskako/daimon
ei)rh/nhs ou)/shs: a)maqe/s g' ei)= kai\ kata/raton.

sp.speaker: *pai=s *lama/xou
sp.l: oi( d' o(/te dh\ sxedo\n h)=san e)p' a)llh/loisin i)o/ntes,
su/n r(' e)/balon r(inou/s te kai\ a)spi/das o)mfaloe/ssas.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: a)spi/das; ou) pau/sei memnhme/nos a)spi/dos h(mi=n;

sp.speaker: *pai=s *lama/xou
sp.l: e)/nqa d' a(/m' oi)mwgh/ te kai\ eu)xwlh\ pe/len a)ndrw=n.

sp.speaker: *pai=s *lama/xou
sp.l: a)lla\ ti/ dh=t' a)/|dw; su\ ga\r ei)pe/ moi oi(=stisi xai/reis.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: w(\s oi( me\n dai/nunto bow=n kre/a, kai\ ta\ toiauti/:
a)/riston proti/qento kai\ a(/tq' h(/dista pa/sasqai.

sp.speaker: *pai=s *lama/xou
sp.l: w(\s oi( me\n dai/nunto bow=n kre/a, kau)xe/nas i(/ppwn

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: ei)=en; e)ko/resqen tou= pole/mou ka)=|t' h)/sqion.
tau=t' a)=|de, tau=q', w(s h)/sqion kekorhme/noi.

sp.speaker: *pai=s *lama/xou
sp.l: pu/rgwn d' e)cexe/onto, boh\ d' a)/sbestos o)rw/rei.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: ou)de\n ga\r a)/|deis plh\n pole/mous. tou= kai/ pot' ei)=;

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: h)= ga\r e)gw\ qau/mazon a)kou/wn, ei) su\ mh\ ei)/hs
a)ndro\s bouloma/xou kai\ klausima/xou tino\s ui(o/s.
a)/perre kai\ toi=s logxofo/roisin a)=|d' i)w/n.
a)=|son pri\n ei)sie/nai ti: su\ ga\r eu)= oi)=d' o(/ti
ou) pra/gmat' a)/|sei: sw/fronos ga\r ei)= patro/s.

sp.speaker: *pai=s *klewnu/mou
sp.l: a)spi/di me\n *sai/+wn tis a)ga/lletai, h(\n para\ qa/mnw|

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: ei)pe/ moi w)= po/sqwn, e)s to\n sautou= pate/r' a)/|deis;

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: a)ll' ei)si/wmen. eu)= ga\r oi)=d' e)gw\ safw=s
o(/ti tau=q' o(/s' h)=|sas a)/rti peri\ th=s a)spi/dos
ou) mh\ 'pila/qh| pot' w)\n e)kei/nou tou= patro/s.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: u(mw=n to\ loipo\n e)/rgon h)/dh 'ntau=qa tw=n meno/ntwn
fla=n tau=ta pa/nta kai\ spodei=n, kai\ mh\ kena\s pare/lkein.
kai\ smw/xet' a)mfoi=n toi=n gna/qoin: ou)de\n ga\r w)= po/nhroi
leukw=n o)do/ntwn e)/rgon e)st', h)\n mh/ ti kai\ masw=ntai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: h(mi=n melh/sei tau=ta/ g': eu)= poiei=s de\ kai\ su\ fra/zwn.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.l: a)ll' w)= pro\ tou= peinw=ntes e)mba/llesqe tw=n lagw/|wn:
pro\s tau=ta bru/ket' h)\ ta/x' h(mi=n fhmi metamelh/sein.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.l: eu)fhmei=n xrh\ kai\ th\n nu/mfhn e)/cw tina\ deu=ro komi/zein
da=|da/s te fe/rein, kai\ pa/nta lew\n sugxai/rein ka)pixoreu/ein.
kai\ ta\ skeu/h pa/lin e)s to\n a)gro\n nuni\ xrh\ pa/nta komi/zein
